name: KUO-TOA MONITOR
senses: Darkvision 120 ft., Truesight 30 ft.; Passive Perception 16

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kuo-toa makes two Bone Whip attacks.

actions.name: Bone Whip
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 10 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Lightning damage, and the target can't make Opportunity Attacks until the start of the kuo-toa's next turn.
